casebody.data:
David SOLOMON, Haines & Kibblehouse, Inc., O'Neil Properties Group, Henkels & McCoy and Commonwealth of Pennsylvania David Solomon and Fanya Solomon
v.
Joseph D. HULME, IV
v.
Haines & Kibblehouse, Inc. Petition of: David Solomon, Haines & Kibblehouse, Inc., O'Neil Properties Group, Henkels & McCoy and McMahon Associates, Inc. No. 461 MAL 2018 Supreme Court of Pennsylvania. January 9, 2019

ORDER

PER CURIAM .

AND NOW, this 9th day of January, 2019, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is DENIED.
